thread.title: donna smith

author: donna smith
title: donna smith
text: Ordered a painting by artist called Sly,my first purchase from artfinder.Was a pleasure ordering through this company.The painting arrived at stated time very well packaged,extremely pleased from start to finish.Artfinder keep you informed from start to finish with regular e mails.Will definitely buy through them again,a very good company ,hence a very happy customer
